name: Infomercial Hero Section
description: A hero section that uses the infomercial format to highlight a product's features, capabilities, and benefits by showing a problem and its solution.

atoms.name: Bold Heading
atoms.description: A large, bold heading used for titles and main messages.

atoms.name: Primary Button
atoms.description: A rectangular button with rounded corners and a distinct background color for primary actions.
atoms.css: background-color: #4169E1; color: white; border-radius: 8px; padding: 12px 24px; font-weight: 500;

atoms.name: Information Card
atoms.description: A container with a light background color, used to group related information.

atoms.name: Vertical Rhythm
atoms.description: Consistent vertical spacing using an 8px grid.

code.css: .hero-container { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; padding: 20px; } .hero-heading { font-size: 32px; font-weight: 700; } .info-card { background-color: #E6E6FA; padding: 16px; } .primary-button { background-color: #4169E1; color: white; border-radius: 8px; padding: 12px 24px; }
